entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
